body.transcript:
Hello! Welcome to Harmony Music School. My name is Jason Ward. How may I assist you today?

Hi Jason, I'm Judy Gray. I'm here because I have a question about my billing.

Nice to meet you, Judy. I'd be happy to help with your billing question. Could you please provide me with your account number to get started?

Sure, my account number is zero zero one two three four.

Thank you, Judy. Can you also confirm the last payment amount you made on your account?

The last payment I made was two five zero dollars.

Great, I see that here. Could you let me know the date of your last payment?

I made the payment on October tenth, twenty twenty-three.

Thanks, Judy. Everything looks up to date on your account. Is there anything else I can do for you?

No, that's all. Thanks for your help, Jason.

You're welcome, Judy. Thank you for reaching out to Harmony Music School. Have a wonderful day!
